Response 1:

Repositioning the Task Force ensures the safety of U.S.A personnel and assets while maintaining a strategic deterrent. Enhanced electronic warfare and surveillance will provide better situational awareness and response capabilities, reducing the risk to U.S.A forces without escalating the conflict further.
